data.title: Queen B Miscellaneous Characters
authors: Contributors to Choices: Stories You Play Wiki
data.meta_description: The good, the bad, and the almost irrelevant. They are the miscellaneous characters that are there to answer that one question, explain away that one plot hole, assist in adding development to that actually relevant character, or give that good (or bad) advice. We usually never learn their...
data.text:
The good, the bad, and the almost irrelevant. They are the miscellaneous characters that are there to answer that one question, explain away that one plot hole, assist in adding development to that actually relevant character, or give that good (or bad) advice. We usually never learn their names. They are there and they are gone as soon as they serve their purpose often never to be seen again. They may not be the most memorable but definitely have a role to play. If the "No Image" picture is used, it means that the particular character has only been mentioned and has never physically appeared.

Book 1 Book 2

Book 1

Chapter 1

Top 259 to 263

Introduced via student ranking:

Mona Gulf resembles Riya from Ride or Die: A Bad Boy Romance, Book 1.

Bartender

The bartender initially refuses to serve you but then gives in. His character model resembles Tony Flores from Wishful Thinking.

Top 193 to 200

Introduced via student ranking:

Lysander Graham resembles Wes Porter from the High School Story series.

Megan Kwan resembles Penny Chen from America's Most Eligible: Wedding Edition.

RJ Chesnut resembles Grant from The Sophomore series.

Flint Lawlor resembles Chadley Fortnum from the Red Carpet Diaries series.

Charlie de la Cruz resembles Tucker Smith from High School Story, Book 3.

Chapter 2

Top 103 to 110

Introduced via student ranking:

Ernesto Pekutchu resembles Santiago from the Rules of Engagement series.

Barbara Tsung resembles Aiko Nakamura from Bloodbound, Book 3 as well as Charlotte St.yves from Open Heart, Book 2.

Cherry Kidd resembles Erin Ward from the High School Story: Class Act series.

Top 74 to 81

Introduced via student ranking:

Karol Denver resembles Ingrid Delaney from Ride or Die: A Bad Boy Romance, Book 1.

Ashley Hawthorne resembles Alma from Open Heart, Book 1.

Steven Roget resembles Stoli Magnusson from Bachelorette Party.

Clarissa Thackery resembles Ines Delarosa from the Open Heart series.

Burlington Coet-Faqtorite resembles Ryder Kohli from the America's Most Eligible series.

Chapter 3

Top 29 to 36

If you boosted your ranking to #34, these students are introduced via student ranking:

Britney Yau resembles Suki from the Rules of Engagement series.

Sofia Fernandez resembles Cassiopeia from Nightbound.

Abioye Uduike resembles Peter Graves from The Heist: Monaco.

Samantha Bream resembles Alison from Save the Date.

Christina Albright resembles female Dale from Save the Date.

Abigail Spencer

If you decide to confront Poppy and Chloe head-on, Abigail cheers for you. She is titled the "tech savvy goth". She is ranked #31 on the student roster. In Chapter 4, she yells at Poppy to get off the field.

Her character model resembles Luna from Platinum. She shares the same surname as Lily Spencer and Jonathan Spencer.

Chapter 4

Jaylen Riaz

Zoey gives you the option to have her ask Jaylen to perform at half-time with you. For more information on Jaylen, click here.

Chapter 5

Waiter

He is the waiter who keeps telling Taylor they don't make frozen yogurt with almond milk. His character model resembles Tony Flores from Wishful Thinking, and is the same model as the Bartender in Chapter 1.

Chapter 6

Bradley Denbrough

Poppy introduces you to her new boyfriend, Bradley Denbrough, an actor from Young Wulfe who is trying to be taken as a more serious actor. In Chapter 7, Poppy uses him to get revenge on Chloe and knock her down the top spot. His character model resembles Chance from It Lives Beneath.

Pupper

At the Downtown Animal Rescue, you play with Pupper and give him a name while you shoot the commercial with Poppy. You have the opportunity to adopt him later.

Julian

At the Downtown Animal Rescue, Julian is one of the shelter's staff. His character model resembles Finn Wildfire from Red Carpet Diaries, Book 1.

Producer

At the Downtown Animal Rescue, the producer directs you and Poppy on the commercial. Her character model resembles Piper from the America's Most Eligible series.

Chapter 7

Bouncer

He is the bouncer at Club Malibu. His character resembles the animal-loving guard in Perfect Match, Book 1.

Chapter 8

Cosmetics Clerk

If you decide to recruit Veronica into your posse, you two vandalize a cardboard cut-out of Poppy at Amphora's. The clerk demands to know what you're doing and you two run out the store giggling. Her character model resembles Payton Saunders from the High School Story series.

Gala Attendee (male)

If you wear the premium outfit, you turn heads and the attendees wonder who you are. The male resembles Jamie Brooks from Most Wanted, Book 1.

Gala Attendee (female 1)

If you wear the premium outfit, she thinks you're one of the New York anthropologists because no one in her circle is that chic. Her character model resembles Miranda Moreau from The Heist: Monaco.

Rita

She appears if you wear the premium earrings and asks you how much your earrings set you back. You tell her that you scarcely remember. In Chapter 12, she asks you if you two have met, but you tell her that you hadn't. She hopes you're not involved with any of the scandals that can happen at Ivy League universities. Her character model resembles Lorelai Lee from The Royal Romance series.

Steven Skaarstellen

Ian/Ina tells you that Steven was the first one to offer him/her a position out of college. S/he has always looked up to and respected him. He is married to Marigold. He resembles Devon Grusk from The Heist: Monaco.

Marigold Skaarstellen

Introduced first as "Food Waster", she is Steven's wife. She has the same hairstyle as Samantha Massey and wears one of Your Character (Bloodbound)'s default outfits. Marigold resembles Emmeline Ebrim from The Royal Romance series.

Chapter 10

Police Officer (female)

When Professor Kingsley barges into Benji's room, he/she brings two police officers with him/her. She asks you if you can tell her what happened in your own words. Her character model resembles Minako from Perfect Match, Book 2.

Police Officer (male)

He reiterates that Benji had followed you on and off campus and took pictures of you to post to the "Tea". His character model resembles Omar from the America's Most Eligible series.

Tripp

The next day, students in the quad ask you what happened. One of them is a boy named Tripp. He resembles Aaron from The Sophomore and The Senior series.

In Book 2, Chapter 16, it is mentioned that his flight to Belvoire for graduation got canceled.

Art Nakamura

If you decide to recruit Thomas into your posse, he gives you information about Poppy's mother having an "affair" with a preschool teacher in Hoboken, New Jersey named Art Nakamura. In Chapter 13, if you decide to break into Poppy's lockbox, you find letters from her to him and vice versa, as well as paternity tests revealing that Art Nakamura is Poppy's biological father.

Chapter 11

DJ

He plays the remix song of your hog-calling. His character model resembles Psyclop from Passport to Romance.

Chapter 12

Ace

He resembles Victor from The Haunting of Braidwood Manor.

Ethan

You can choose to dance with him and if you do, you will call him Craig even though that's not his name but he goes along with it. His name remains as Partygoer, and he calls your team "Team Young N' Sexy". He resembles Gael from Passport to Romance.

Partygoer

You have the option to dance with her. She resembles Pippa Majors from the Red Carpet Diaries series.

Chapter 13

Chase McGovern

Dean Steinhelm introduces Chase to you and Poppy, but he needs no introduction as he is one of Belvoire's most famous alumni, a legendary football player who went pro. If you decide to give him a tour of the campus with Poppy, you have opportunities to mess with Poppy and call her out, or compliment Chase's skills and career. He attended Belvoire on an athletic scholarship, and didn't become "New Money" until he received his first paycheck as a pro football player. He was a tight end at Belvoire, with 200 receptions and 27 touchdowns. He has a little sister, Ash, who loves Veronica's videos; and because his sister was in Kappa Epsilon while she was in college, she made him promise not to set foot inside a Zeta House because they were sorority rivals.

Later, you tell him about Zoey and your falling out with her, and he gives you advice. You bring him to meet Zoey as well. If you tell her that you told him she's a babe, he flirts with her and she calls him "Mr. Biceps". His character model resembles Zeke from America's Most Eligible series.

Chapter 14

Valentina Blanco

She is the interior designer that you and Poppy meet with to discuss the gala decorations. Her character model resembles Rosanna Navarro from The Royal Heir, Book 2.

Chapter 15

Paparazzi

He takes Poppy's picture as she stands on the red carpet. In Book 2, Chapter 5, he is in the audience at Octavia Olivier's fashion show. If you decide to step over Claudia when she falls, he calls the action "vicious". His character model resembles Mikail Greene from Perfect Match, Book 2.

Chad Bentley

Chad is the reporter for Celeb Highlight. If you recruited Professor Roberta to your posse, he tells you that she is one of their superfans and has been vocal about you taking home the Person to Watch Award tonight. His character model resembles Leland St. James from the Red Carpet Diaries series. He shares the same first name as Chad and Chad (My Two First Loves).

Ana Min-Sinclair

If you spend diamonds to improve the gala decorations, she compliments them. Later, if you recruited Chloe to your posse, Chloe introduces you to her and her husband. With the introduction, you can impress Poppy's parents, who you assume are unaware of Poppy's hatred towards you by the way they act towards you. Her character model resembles Aiko Nakamura and Barbara Tsung (106 in the rankings). She shares the same first name as Ana De Luca.

Piers Sinclair

If you spend diamonds to improve the gala decorations, he compliments them. Later, if you recruited Chloe to your posse, Chloe introduces you to him and his wife. With the introduction, you can impress Poppy's parents, who you assume are unaware of Poppy's hatred towards you by the way they act towards you. His character model resembles Dorian Delacroix from The Sophomore series.

Chester Morton

Carter introduces you to Chester who played quarterback for Belvoire when Carter was a freshman. If you recruited Carter, he advises you not to talk about football because Chester had a rough season and his team ranked in last place. His character model resembles Frank from Bachelorette Party.

Sandra Lombardi

Veronica introduces you to her mother. If you recruited Veronica, she tells you that her mother is a fashion designer who made Veronica's dress for the night. If you compliment her, Sandra tells you that she and Octavia will have a collection coming out next spring.

You run into her again in Book 2, Chapter 2, at the Apoidea party. She designed the looks for the prom scene in "F is for Friends" which Veronica has been hyping up on her TikTok for months.

Her character model resembles Amalas from The Royal Heir series.

Book 2

Chapter 1

Recruiter (Female 1)

This recruiter talks about a career in entomology. Her character model resembles a version of Wendy Park from the High School Story: Class Act series.

Recruiter (Female 2)

She talks about her company Merciful Milks. She also says they are recruiting conscientious individuals. Her character model resembles Eleanor Harlenay from Veil of Secrets.

Recruiter (Male)

He tries to recruit you with human taxidermy. He wants to hand you a pamphlet. His character model resembles the archive clerk from Bloodbound.

Matilda Birch

She is first pictured in the student ranking in Book 1, Chapter 1 and she ranked #257. She is part of the crowd that mobs you when you step out of your dormitory. In Chapter 3, she asks if Poppy will perform in the half-time show or not and if you decide to sit with Selene's crew, she will praise you. In Chapter 13, you find her with the group of nerds by the pond. She tells Selene to make Ford work for her, and if Selene refuses, then she is a part of the problem and not part of the solution. Later, if you choose to sway the nerds to your side, she is in the group of nerds. She says she took her first Anthropology class with Professor Kingsley and bombed her first test. Kingsley never gave up on her, and now she loves Anthropology so much, she declared it her major. Her character model resembles Winona Johnson from Perfect Match, Book 2.

Emi Less

She is first pictured in the student ranking in Book 1, Chapter 1 and she ranked #259. In Book 2, Chapter 3, Trixie is heard gossiping that she saw Emi fighting Daisy in a Taco Bell parking lot. In Chapter 13, she praises your premium outfit or glasses if you wear them. She mentions that she has been ignored for four years. She also attends the meeting to meet X. Her character model resembles female Sora from Open Heart: Second Year.

Crispin Reynolds

He says that Poppy got owned by Selene, and that Selene is his "new hero". He also tells you to consider them as your "royal guard". In Chapter 3, if you choose to say that Kingsley is obsessed with you, it is revealed that last year he sent you a text inviting you to "a one-on-one study sesh of each other's minds and bodies". When his picta is mentioned at the football game, he defends himself and says he worked with Gates McFadden's niece's babysitter's brother on it.

In Chapter 13, he recognizes you even if you wear the premium outfit with or without the glasses. He will allow you to pass through the doors to the meeting with X if you kiss him on the cheek or kick him in groin. At the meeting, Emi is shocked that he was willing to "eat" the elite and he defends himself that he has an adventurous palate. His character model resembles Anton Severus from The Royal Romance series.

Preach

She said that Poppy was just awful as she was the year before. In Chapter 3, she is the one who asks you to hear your side of the story.

Her character model resembles Alexis from Sunkissed.

Rex Dotie

He is first pictured in the student ranking in Book 1, Chapter 1 and he ranked #255. He says that Poppy didn't learn anything and asks why can't she leave MC alone. In Chapter 3, if you decide to blast Pete on The T, Rex thinks maybe they got it all wrong and X fooled them all into believing you were having a romantic relationship with Professor Kingsley. In Chapter 13, he is in the group of nerds going to meet X. If you choose to sway the nerds to your side, he is upset that he sent money to X via a ComePayMe link and he still hasn't received the 'When Pigs Fly' t-shirt with your face on it that X promised. His character model resembles Zeph Hernandez from The Elementalists series.

Chapter 2

Bouncer (2)

He is the bouncer you meet at the warehouse entrance, who asks for your invitation. He also appears in Chapter 16 as he drags Persephone away. His character model resembles Nikhil Banderjee from the Bloodbound series.

Darren Corflin

He is the director of "F for Friends" and close to Tinsley Ackerby. He informs you that Tinsley's best friend Muffy will take over her role in the next movie. If you say that's the most sensible thing you have ever heard, he offers you his card and invites you to audition for a minor role in the sequel. His character model resembles Tommy Phelps from Red Carpet Diaries, Book 2.

Muffy Lately

Muffy is Tinsley's best friend. If you tell Tinsley that Muffy is taking her role in the sequel, Tinsley smears Muffy on social media.

Kevin

He is the bouncer of the VIP section. If you choose to enter, you can bluff your way past him. He will believe you instead of Poppy. If you infer you're the actress that plays Kenna Rhys on the television show, he asks you to autograph his chest. He mentions he has a husband. His character model resembles a fan from The Sophomore, Book 2.

Waiter (2)

If you decide to order the most expensive alcohol there, he will deliver it to you, Zoey, and Tinsley. His character model resembles a waiter from The Sophomore, Book 2.

Random Lady

If you decide to kick out two random people out of VIP, the waiter first chooses her. Her character model resembles Professor Bhatt from It Lives In The Woods.

Catchy Jingle Guy

If you decide to kick out two random people out of VIP, the waiter chooses him next. His character model resembles a fan from Red Carpet Diaries, Book 1.

Chapter 3

Rowan

He is one of the nerds who discussed and debated with Pete and other nerds at Senior Commons. If you choose to sit with Selene's crew, he offers you and Zoey refreshment drink. He calls you and Zoey "pretty ladies". His character model resembles Danny Cardinal from the Open Heart series.

Howard Deduque

He is first pictured in the student ranking in Book 1, Chapter 1 and he ranked #194. He is one of the nerds who discussed and debated with Pete and other nerds at Senior Commons. In Chapter 13, he is with the group of nerds that go to meet X. If you decide to win the nerds over, he mentions that his mom works in housekeeping and tells him that her worst jobs are always the ones that clean up after slobs. He is also seen making out with Daisy, telling her that her pants are undone when they are caught.

His character model resembles Anton Edison from The Heist: Monaco.

Arabella Marconi

She is first pictured in the student ranking in Book 1, Chapter 1 and she ranked #200. She brings up that Professor Kingsley's texts were all over The T. If you tell her that Kingsley had a good reason to text you, she will say that she is glad to hear your side of the story. If you tell her that Kingsley is obsessed with you, she will ask Crispin if he was thirsting over you too and will call him fake. Her character model resembles Amber Hutchinson from the High School Story: Class Act series.

Begonia Thotte

When Chloe's voice is heard through the speakers in the stadium and she says that she saw Begonia shopping at a thrift store, Begonia protests that she isn't poor. In Chapter 4, she is part of the mob of Poppy haters. Her character model resembles Fatima Alinejad from the America's Most Eligible series.

Daisy Tungsten

She is first pictured in the student ranking in Book 1, Chapter 1 and she ranked #258. In Book 2, she sits among Selene's friends. Trixie is heard gossiping that she saw Daisy fighting Emi Less in a Taco Bell parking lot and Daisy says she'll do it again. If you reveal that Poppy was not behind the football show's interruption, she becomes an X hater. In Chapter 13, she is with the group of nerds that go to meet X. If you decide to win the nerds over, she is seen making out with Howard, although she tries to deny it.

Her character model resembles Keiki Lahela from the Open Heart series.

Chapter 4

Freshman Zeta

When you and Zoey go to the Zeta House, she recognizes you and asks you what's going on. She also adds that Chloe said that they couldn't go to the game until they finished clearing the fruit punch.Maisie made up a rumor that she picked her nose and wiped it on her designer cloths because she hums while she walks. Her character model resembles Kayle McGuin from the Laws of Attraction series.

Bouncer (3)

When you, Zoey, and Poppy go to hidden Zeta clubhouse, he tells Poppy that he can't let her in because it's exclusive. Zoey tells him that she is with them, so he lets all of you inside. His character model resembles one version of Elijah Harris from the My Two First Loves series.

Sausage Fingers

When you interrogate the Zeta sisters, she tells you she was busy using bee's wax to wax trophies at the Zeta House during the football game. However, she was allergic to the wax, her fingers swole up, and she broke into a rash. Veronica kicks her out of the house because the latter can no longer help her take pictures due to her swollen fingers.

In Chapter 8, despite being ousted by Veronica, she is still listed as a "Freshman Zeta" and if you decide to show you're above Professor Kingsley's "insults" that X posted on The T, she helps you at the poolhouse. She also appears in Chapter 9 to help the Zetas set up the bacchanalia. Her character model resembles one version of Your Sister (Baby Bump).

Chapter 5

Star Alverado

She is first pictured in the student ranking in Book 1, Chapter 1 and she ranked #260. When you arrive at Octavia's show, she tells you that Octavia always gives the first fifty of her best-dressed fans tickets to see the new collection. If you are wearing a premium outfit, she and the others believe you. If you are wearing a default outfit, they don't and want to push you to the end of the line. Her character model resembles Serafine Dupont from the Bloodbound series.

Rey Chu

He is first pictured in the student ranking in Book 1, Chapter 1 and he ranked #107. When you arrive at Octavia's show, he complains that someone is standing on his Givenchy wingtips. If you are wearing a premium outfit, he and the others believe you. If you are wearing a default outfit, they don't and want to push you to the end of the line. If you perform successfully on the catwalk, he is one of the audience members who yells that they love you.

In Chapter 13, if you choose to sway the nerds to your side, he is in the group of nerds. He said this was going to be the year he finally went to an Alpha party until X's sweaty minion had the fraternity dissolved. His character model resembles Tad Princeton from Red Carpet Diaries, Book 2.

Ayre Bender

She is first pictured in the student ranking in Book 1, Chapter 1 and she ranked #103. When you arrive at Octavia's show, she tells Rey that his shoes aren't from Givenchy. If you are wearing a premium outfit, she and the others believe you. If you are wearing a default outfit, they don't and want to push you to the end of the line. If you perform successfully on the catwalk, she speaks as if she is reporting to her vlog that you're dominating the runway.

In Chapter 13, if you choose to sway the nerds to your side, she is in the group of nerds. You mention that she upcycles her outfits from Goodwill so cute that people almost forget she didn't buy them brand new. She is happy that you understand the look that she is going for. Her character model resembles Madison Eckhart from The Freshman series.

Fatima Alinejad

She is the lead stylist and model wrangler of Octavia's show. For more information on Fatima, click here.

Paloma

If you decide to learn from the experienced models, she helps you to keep your balance on the runway by rubbing sandpaper against your shoes. Ashley tells you that trick saved her innumerable times from losing balance. Her character model resembles Apricott Persimmon from Red Carpet Diaries, Book 2.

Claudia Rose

She is an international supermodel who looks down on you for being the new girl. When Fatima tells her that Octavia changed the walking order, she is angry and storms off, stating that she is not following you - a nobody. When Claudia is on the runway, you notice her wobbly ankles and unsteady gait. When she falls in your path, you have the option to either help her or to step over her. Her character model resembles Nicole Anderson from the Bloodbound series.

Naomi

Jada informs you that she is the best to talk about your walk on the runway. If you choose to ask the models to help you, she tells you that Octavia prefers the Wintour walk. Her character model resembles Audrey from the Rules of Engagement series.

Ashley

If you choose to ask the models to help you, Jada tells you that Ashley knows how to wow the crowd. Ashley tells you that at her first show she was "emperor's new clothes"-ed and walked in her underwear. She also says that Octavia's brand is hyperfocused on appealing to the 'it-girl who has it all' and you need to be charming, fierce, and bubbly. Her character model resembles Theresa Holland from Most Wanted, Book 1.

Jada

When a rack of designer dresses were about to fall on you, she saves you and you end up on her lap. You also have the option to flirt with her. Her character model resembles Mira Banerji from the Rules of Engagement series.

Octavia Olivier

Although mentioned a few times in Book 1 especially if you decide to buy her latest fashions, you do not meet Octavia until her fashion show, which is your second Apoidea challenge. When Claudia looks down on your introduction, Octavia tells her that everyone's money was new at one point or another. Octavia suggests you learn from the models backstage before she leaves. When Claudia throws a hissy fit, Octavia puts her in her place. Her character model resembles Grace Liao from The Freshman series.

Couture Editor

She is in the audience but you don't interact with her. Her character model resembles Edith from Save the Date.

Ebony Simone

She is in the audience. Her name is revealed in Chapter 15, and she works with "Gaze" publication or media. Her character model resembles Faye Devore from Mother of the Year.

Business Editor

If you decide to focus your attention on the business editor in the audience and you choose to wear Octavia's premium outfit, she says that you are stunning and the dress is perfect for clinching a new client. Her character model resembles Blaire Hall from the Rules of Engagement series.

Ladies Mag Editor

If you decide to help Claudia up when she falls, this editor says she has never seen sportsmanship like this since the runway was invented. Her character model resembles Lina from the America's Most Eligible series.

Chapter 6

Reporter

She along with other reporters and photographers come to interview you, after hearing you getting suspended. If you choose the premium outfit, she notices Poppy later and starts questioning Poppy. Her character model resembles Ellen Thompson from Wishful Thinking.

Petra

She compliments you if you are wearing the premium outfit or the wig Taylor gave you. If you ask if any of them drinks the Bellow Velvet, she is offended that you would suggest it. Her character model resembles a version of Mackenzie Price from My Two First Loves.

Fil DuFutur

He states that he and Petra placed in the regional latte slam for four years. His character model resembles Elijah Simmons from the Baby Bump series.

Alex

You have the option to flirt with him. His character model resembles Peter Graves from The Heist: Monaco and Aboiye Uduike from the same series.

Natalia Romanoffa

She is first pictured in student ranking in Book 1, Chapter 1 and she ranked #77. Maisie spread rumors that she had chronic flatulence freshman year because she posted dog filter picture of Maisie covered in coffee on The T. Her character model resembles Madeleine Amaranth from The Royal Romance series.

Katherine

Her character model resembles Zaira Castell from Foreign Affairs.

Hot Repair Guy

His character model resembles Hudson Park from Slow Burn.

Manager

His character model resembles Dale from Save the Date.

Akio

He is one of Maisie's victims. His character model resembles Will from Laws of Attraction, Book 1.

Pool Boy

His character model resembles Frank from Bachelorette Party and Chester Morton from the same series.

Chapter 7

Margot Dupris

Felicity introduces you to Margot, who is one of the Apoidea Elites. She wants you to follow her husband and bring her evidence of his adultery so that she can divorce him and gain a hefty settlement from him. Her character model resembles Adelaide Amaranth from The Royal Romance series.

Victor Dupris

Felicty tells you that Victor is taking his mistress to an early dinner at the Milton Banks Hotel, and you set off with your posse to follow him through town and take pictures of his activities. His character model resembles Ellis Knight from Platinum.

Florist

Victor visits a flower shop to purchase flowers for his mistress. If you choose to avoid suspicion while taking picture of the flowers by sneaking up behind him, the florist asks what you are doing. If you recruited Penelope in book 1, she distracts the florist to help you take the picture. Her character model resembles Anika Grover from Open Heart series.

Clerk

She is the cashier at the chocolate shop that Victor visits to purchase chocolates for his mistress. He is angry that she doesn't know if the chocolates were manufactured in a factory where there might have been shellfish. Her character model resembles Nehal Mistry from The Elementalists series.

Grandma

You see at the jewellery shop that Victor visits to purchase a necklace. You have the option to pretend to help her while taking picture of the necklace. Her character model resembles Celia McKenzie from Hot Couture.

Employee

He is the employee at the man's custom suit shop that Victor visits to purchase suit. His character model resembles a version of Dave Price from My Two First Loves.

Tawny

She is Victor's mistress who is aware that he is married. Her character model resembles Felicity Holloway from Desire & Decorum series.

Concierge

He is the concierge at the hotel that Victor and his mistress go to. You have the option to flirt with him to get Victor's receipt. His character model resembles Benedict Highgate from A Very Scandalous Proposal.

Lil Nos F

He is first mentioned in Book 2, Chapter 3 if you choose to record a diss track calling out X. He is a two-time Jammy winner, and an icon of summer. His songs include: Down Never Out.

His character model resembles Henri Garnier from Foreign Affairs.

Lil Nos Fan (Male)

If you choose to brag about being Zoey's BFF, he says you are probably fishing for attention. His character model resembles Teddy Birch from Laws of Attraction, Book 1.

Lil Nos Fan (Female)

She asks Lil Nos F if he can sign her album cover. Her character model resembles Kasi from Hot Couture.

Lariat Lyndon

She is first pictured in the student ranking in Book 1, Chapter 1 and she ranked #109. If you choose to brag about being Zoey's BFF she asks if you are hyping her or yourself. Her character model resembles Kiana from the America's Most Eligible series.

Chapter 8

Diamonte

She is one of the theater nerds. Later in Chapter 14, she fangirls over you and Kingsley when Kingsley goes to your dorm. You mention she and Esthershlie are freshman, which is the reason she never got a rank. Her character model resembles Amy Lancaster from With Every Heartbeat.

Esthershlie

She is one of the theater nerds. Later in Chapter 14, she fangirls over you and Kingsley when Kingsley goes to your dorm. You mention she and Diamonte are freshman. If you romance Kingsley, she names your ship the Bea-sley ship. Her character model resembles Allegra Windermere from A Very Scandalous Proposal.

Benjiro

At first, he is aghast at having to carry you with the others. However, when you show them that following you would be beneficial to them, he agrees. His character model resembles Eddie from Rising Tides.

Mail Carrier

Outside of Professor Kingsley's home, she hands you your next Apoidea summons. She says "Videmus omnia" (which translates to "We see everything" in Latin). Her character model resembles Beth from Rising Tides.

Ford's Mentor

She along with Felicity and Poppy's mentor give you and the Top 15 the murder mystery challenge. She tells you that each person has been assigned a role and your challenge is to prove you're able to operate within the confines of the power it provides you. In Chapter 15, she and Felicity have to pull Poppy and Selene off each other during the bathroom fight. Her character model resembles Tallulah Copeland from Mother of the Year.

Poppy's Mentor

His character model resembles Professor Masako from Foreign Affairs.

Staff

During the murder mystery, you come across her and ask if you're allowed to ask her anything. She tells her you're allowed one question. If you ask the correct question, she tells you Ford shouldn't have trusted his brother. Her character model resembles Effie Ainsley from The Unexpected Heiress.

Chapter 10

Cow

For your Apoidea challenge, you decide to bring farm animals for a petting zoo to solicit donations for small farms. At the end of the chapter, you have to convince the football team to help you wrangle the cows back when X sets them loose.

Silvia

For your Apoidea challenge, you decide to bring farm animals for a petting zoo to solicit donations for small farms. Silvia is one of the cows. Her character model resembles the adoptable cow from Big Sky Country, Book 1.

Gloria

For your Apoidea challenge, you decide to bring farm animals for a petting zoo to solicit donations for small farms. At the end of the chapter, you have to literally hog-wrestle Gloria to subdue her when X sets the animals free to reign chaos.

Spawn of Money

She is the daughter of "Rich Mom" who you can either persuade to adopt a piglet, or tell her their deaths are a factor of the circle of life. Her character model resembles Camellia from Rules of Engagement, Book 3.

Wilbur

Wilbur is the piglet they can adopt. The daughter gives him his name. Later, you can opt to take another piglet (who you name Wilber 2.0) to Selene's charity to win over her visitors for your own. Its character model resembles the adoptable piglet from Big Sky Country, Book 2.

Rich Mom

After visiting your charity, she and her daughter head to Poppy's charity. There she vomits all over Poppy, possibly due to food poisoning as the rest of the donors get sick at the same time and cause a mess at Poppy's shelter. In Chapter 15, she attends the Oculus Ball as she is one of the Apoidea elites and asks Poppy a question. Her character model resembles a version of Vivian Dalton from The Nanny Affair series.

Moneybags

At your petting zoo, he thinks that the goat is giving him a bad look. You can convince him of the benefits of goat milk with or without mentioning celebrity Buddy McFenderton, the latter causing him to donate to your charity. In Chapter 16, he is afraid that Poppy's "farmers" brought a goat with them.

His character model resembles Viktor Montmartre from Red Carpet Diaries, Book 2.

Goat

This is a goat at your petting zoo, who is minding his own business munching on grass.

Mr. Fellows

He is one of the donors at Poppy's charity. If you publicized her family's troubles, he also offers her a check for her father to help them through their tough times. His character model resembles Pierce Sterling from Veil of Secrets.

Skipper

He is one of the puppies at Poppy's shelter. His yipping reminds you of Poppy's incessant prattle. Its character model resembles the adoptable puppy from Wishful Thinking.

Calf

At your charity, you push Professor Kingsley into a barn to convince him/her to help look after your charity as you make rounds trying to figure out X's identity. The calf nuzzles Kingsley's hand. Its character model resembles a calf from Big Sky Country series.

Fancy Mom

She is Jerome's mom, who you can convince to look at your petting zoo. If you do, she and Jerome leave the shelter and head for your charity. Her character model resembles a version of Melissa from Foreign Affairs.

Jerome

His character model resembles a version of young Bad Boy from My Two First Loves.

Marilyn

If you bring the piglet to Selene's charity, you convince her and Beatrice to check out your petting zoo and your charity. If you don't bring the piglet, she and Beatrice stay. Her character model resembles Margaret Montjoy from A Very Scandalous Proposal.

Beatrice

If both she and Marilyn stay, they offer pity checks to Selene when her auction items are stolen. If you decide to be a "bad girl" and have the dolphin terrorize them, Beatrice calls Marilyn by name. Her character model resembles Mrs. Mercado from Save the Date.

Flipper

He is the dolphin at Selene's charity. If you play the "bad girl" and slip fish into "Look Mean"'s pocket (and Marilyn and Beatrice's purses if they stay), Flipper gets angry and attacks them. Its character model resembles a dolphin from Laws of Attraction, Book 1.

Looks Mean

When Selene gets teary-eyed at the loss of her auction items (and if Flipper goes beserk), he offers Selene a pity check for her charity. His character model resembles Garrett Thorne from Open Heart: Second Year.

Chapter 12

Maya deRose

In Book 1, Chapter 5, if you reach Rank 14, Maya deRose is listed as Rank 15. In Book 2, Chapter 12, if you are mean to Selene when she helps you discover that Lexi is Throwaway1989, Maya is in the courtyard recording your interaction and posts it under the caption "Queen goes full Timberlake... Tells Little Selene to cry her a river." She is known as the campus' only cool goth. Her character model resembles resembles Bri from Nightbound.

Ashanti Coleman

She is the curator of the Natural History Museum. She tells you about the exhibit and explains that "Dr. Lexi Montgomery" brings in the crowds to the museum, which is why the latter is the guide for the unveiling instead of the former. Her character model resembles Isabel from the LoveHacks series.

Todd

Lexi constantly belittles him. He tells her that he is an "instructor", but she says he only taught for one semester and had a fling with a Eurotrash "model". His character model resembles Mr. Olson from the High School Story: Class Act series.

Maxwell Beaumont

Maxwell tells Bertrand that the subway got them to the museum on time just like he said it would, except it didn't have any mole people which made him disappointed. They are there for the museum tour and unveiling of their ancestor's remains. For more information on Maxwell Beaumont, click here.

Bertrand Beaumont

Bertrand believes being on time is actually being late, and prefers to be early because he feels that is "on time". You can have Lexi impress or disappoint him by giving her cues via Zoey. For more information on Bertrand Beaumont, click here.

Lexi's Boss

He is Lexi's boss who is suprised by Kingsley's hesitation taking the job. According to him, the museum has an extensive vetting process and Kingsley's application has been in the system for months. He later discovers Lexi is the one who forged the application and he fires her. His character model resembles Professor Englund from The Elementalists series.

Amanda

You see her if you choose to go after Ian/Ina after confronting Lexi. She tries to take picture of you and Ian/Ina. Her name isn't revealed until chapter 13. In Chapter 13, if you decide to win over the nerds, she asks you how they can be sure that you have their best interests in mind. Her character model resembles Morgan Jennings from the High School Story series.

Chapter 13

Zachary "Zach" Bainques

He is first pictured in the student ranking in Book 1, Chapter 1, ranking #13. In Chapter 11, he attends Zeta House's Bacchanalia, coming to sample the fountain after you and Chloe. In Book 2, Chapter 13, he is locked out of the dorms by X's hacker during the nerds' revolution. Daisy Tungsten forces Erik VonWooten to pick him up by aiming a drone at them. He complains that he isn't elite; he's barely in the Top 15 and he listens to K-Pop. He is known as the campus skater-boy. You can either choose to save him from Daisy or vow to avenge him. His character model resembles Garrett from Nightbound.

Pierre

He is in line with you and Emi to meet X. His character model resembles Khaan Mousavi from Perfect Match, Book 2.

Chapter 14

Waiter (3)

At the masquerade, he gives you your first clue. His character model resembles Tony Flores from Wishful Thinking.

Masked Man

You find him at the bar, and he gives you the next clue. You can also buy him a drink to gain more votes and improve your reputation in the Apoidea society. His character model resembles a fan from The Sophomore, Book 2.

Old Lady

If you approach the old lady, she talks your ear off about her childhood friend, Mabel, and how much you resemble her. Her character model resembles Linda Joy from Home for the Holidays.

Oberlin Brinksley III

When you are tasked to ruin him, you find that his socials are blocked from public eye. Since he shares a mutual friend with you - Zoey - you ask her to look at his socials through her phone. She tells you that he is a professional trust fund baby who stands to gain hundreds of millions of dollars. He is also Tinsley Ackerby's on-again-off-again boyfriend. She tells you taht he sneaks money out of the family business's accounts when he thinks no one is looking. You can choose to ruin him by sending a pic of him and his "side chick" to Tinsley or take snapshots of his Picta pictures proving his embezzlement to the FBI. You can also ruin his reputation to other Apoidea members. His character model resembles Nikhil Banderjee from Bloodbound series.

Mysterious Woman

She is the older sister of Oberlin Brinksley III, who gives you the task to ruin his reputation so that their father will have no choice but to leave his company to her rather than to Oberlin. You can choose to share a picture of him talking with his "side chick" to Tinsley Ackerby, or send evidence of his embezzlement that he posted on Picta to the FBI and media. If you choose the latter, his father calls him up to accuse him of embezzlement. She also asks if you're willing to help her by making sure he has no way to wiggle out of the scandal. If you choose to help her, you can also ruin his reputation publicly to fellow Apoidea members by having Felicity overhear his criticisms of the society. Her character model resembles Bianca Sandoval from the America's Most Eligible series.

Side Chick

She is Oberlin's side chick, who you can take a picture of to send to Tinsley. It is unclear if she is the gala attendee that you met in book 1. Her character model resembles Miranda Moreau from The Heist: Monaco.

Terrance

His character model resembles Peter Graves from The Heist: Monaco.

Cheryl

Her character model resembles Mariana Castillo from the Baby Bump series.

Dancing Horse

You have a option to bring the horse to help Terrance propose Cheryl. It resembles Ardiente from Red Carpet Diaries.

Not the One

If you choose to extend your dance, you see a flash of gold on her neck and suspect she is X but when you get a closer look, you realize she isn't X as her necklace doesn't match the description you were given. Her character model resembles Kiara Theron from The Royal Romance series.

Chapter 15

Marcus Sharpe

He appears as Poppy's plus one. For more information on Marcus Sharpe, click here.

Rowan Osbourne

She is the president of The Apoidea Society and the one who sent you the letters from the society. You can impress her by telling her you would be aiming for her job if you were accepted as a member.

Chapter 16

Angelique Gagnon

She is one of the representatives you have to impress for your final Apoidea challenge. Hailing from Paris, she is in med school and is one of the youngest Apoidea members. She really hates Poppy as she got in a massive fight with the latter while studying abroad at Belvoire during her sophomore year. Her character model resembles Scarlett Emerson from Veil of Secrets.

Bandile Dlamini

He is one of the representatives you have to impress for your final Apoidea challenge. He is from Cape Town, South Africa and is a big name in the facial recognition software industry. He hates talking about himself because he's very wary of being spied on. His character model resembles a version of Jebediah Covington from Baby Bump, Book 2.

Hoa Ngo

She is one of the representatives you have to impress for your final Apoidea challenge. She is from Saigon and is a Vietnamese ambassador to the US. She's all about tact, subtlety and respect. Her character model resembles Whisper from The Heist: Monaco.

Bingo's Owner

He is one of the actors that Poppy hired. He pretends to be a farmer, but you catch him in his lies. His character model resembles Duke Oakley from the Big Sky Country series.

Old McDonald

Her character model resembles Jenny from The Nanny Affair series.

Woman

She is an Apoidea member. The first time she went out to dinner at a fancy restaurant, she ate the free dinner rolls immediately. She wanted to know if fancy bread tasted better while it was hot. She says that it tasted like she was tasting what it felt like to truly live for the first time. Her character model resembles Alma Velasco from Mother of the Year.

Man

He is an Apoidea member. When he was in law school, his nanny forgot to send him his weekly stipend and he was forced to eat from the law school cafeteria. It was a difficult experience for him as the cafeteria chef only had one Michelin star. He says that he can't believe people live their entire lives like that. His character model resembles Rick Bauman from Red Carpet Diaries, Book 1.

Charlotte

She is Kingsley's niece, who you invite to attend your graduation if Kingsley is your final love interest. For her character models, face 1 resembles a version of young MC from It Lives In The Woods, face 2 resembles Valerie from The Royal Romance series, face 3 resembles Jane Marshall from It Lives In The Woods.

Lilian

She is Kingsley's sister, who you invite to attend your graduation if Kingsley is your final love interest. For her character models, face 1 resembles Sonja Dormer from Crimes of Passion, Book 1, face 2 resembles female Britney from It Lives In The Woods, face 3 resembles Eleanor Waverley from The Haunting of Braidwood Manor.

Clint Burton
